fields.name: Ryuko
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model may only choose a Friendly Shisai model for its Channel Trait. When this model gains Ki from the Channel Trait, it also gains a Virtue Token.
While this model is in play, when a Friendly Shisai model spends a Virtue Token it may choose the following effect: • This model gains Parry (1) until the current activation is complete.

fields.name: Takashi Mako
fields.uniqueEffects:
While this model is in play the Opposing Player cannot use Pass Tokens.
Requirement [Takashi]
Enemy models may not use the Prowess trait while involved in a Melee Exchange with this model.

fields.name: Cub
fields.uniqueEffects:
The Cub has separate Wound boxes to Kazuo. Mark Wound boxes as usual from left to right. You must mark Kazuo's Wound boxes first. This model's Last Stand trait triggers when either Kazuo's 6 Wound boxes or the Cub's 2 Wound boxes are all marked.
This model has the Aware and Defensive traits while the Cub has unmarked Wound boxes. You may choose to lose these traits in a Melee Exchange but, if you do, any Damage done to this model will be applied to the Cub's boxes instead of Kazuo's.
When this model uses its Last Stand trait, it gains Activation Counters up to a maximum of 2 and all its Attacks are Critical Attacks in addition to any chosen Special Ability.

fields.name: Kazuki
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model declares a Wait Action to remove Reload Markers, its Ranged Weapons gain Lightweight until the End Phase.

fields.name: Shiho Keita
fields.uniqueEffects: At the end of any activation when another Friendly model spends one or more Virtue Tokens, this model may Walk 1". While this model is in play, when a Friendly Loyal model spends a Virtue Token you may choose one of the following effects for that model: • Walk this model 1". • Move this model out of BtB with an Enemy model until it leaves that model's ZoC. • This model gains Dodge (1) and Ranged Defence (1) until the End Phase. • This model gains Endurance until the End Phase.

fields.name: Shiho Wimpie
fields.uniqueEffects: In the Starting Phase you may place this model within 1" of its current position.

fields.name: Shiho Yusuke
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model declares a Wait Action to remove Reload Markers, its Ranged Weapons gain Lightweight until the End Phase.

fields.name: Shiho Shota
fields.uniqueEffects:
When this model declares a Wait Action to remove Reload Markers, its Ranged Weapons gain Lightweight until the End Phase.
This model may choose to use this ability when it chooses to use its Dai Kyu Ranged Weapon during a Ranged Attack. This model's Dai Kyu Ranged Weapon gains Reload (+1) and this model does not need LoS to target a Ranged Attack, ignores Cover, and ignores the Blind State during a Ranged Attack Action.

fields.name: Shiho Misaki
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model declares a Wait Action to remove Reload Markers, its Ranged Weapons gain Lightweight until the End Phase.

fields.name: Yoshitaka
fields.uniqueEffects:
While this model is in play, when a Friendly Loyal model spends a Virtue Token, you may choose one of the following effects: • This model may increase a Statistic by 1 until the current test or movement is resolved. This is considered to be a Ki Boost.
If the Attached model succeeds on an Attack Roll in a Melee Exchange while using this weapn then, until the end of the Melee Exchange it takes half Damage from any attack the Enemy model makes.  Requirement [Loyal & Samurai]
This model gains +1 Melee Pool when engaged in a Melee Exchange with an Exhausted model.
This model may only be recruited into a Warband using the Open Rebellion theme.

fields.name: Heimin
fields.uniqueEffects: This model gains Bravery when declaring actions Targeting or Selecting a model already in BtB with a Friendly model. This model gains Fearless when declaring actions Targeting or Selecting a model already in BtB with Tanaka Tsuki, or when using Bodyguard.

fields.name: Aiko
fields.uniqueEffects:
While this model is in play, when a Friendly model spends a Virtue Token you may choose the following effects: • Fire: This model's weapons gain +1 Strength and Fire (1/1) until the current action is resolved • Water: This model heals 2 Wounds • Earth: This model gains Armour (2) until the current action is resolved • Metal: This model gains Powerful Attack (1) for the current activation • Air: This model gains +1 Move and Lightfooted until the End Phase • Void: This model gains 2 Ki Tokens
When this model is the Target of a Melee or Charge Action by an Enemy Animal model, that model must make a Ki Challenge Test (5). If it fails, its activation ends and it loses an Activation Counter as normal.

fields.name: Yuuki
fields.uniqueEffects: In the Starting Phase this model can be placed within 1” of its current location.

fields.name: Tsutsumi
fields.uniqueEffects: While this model is in play, when a Friendly model spends a Virtue Token you may choose the following effect:  • This model may Focus as a Simple Action rather than a Complex Action

fields.name: Suchiro
fields.uniqueEffects: Twin Shisa do not gain Activation Counters during the Starting Phase. During the Starting Phase, place 2 Activation Counters on this card.  Twin Shisa share a single Activation Counter pool. When a Twin Shisa would gain or remove an Activation Counter, instead place or remove those Activation Counters on this card. Either Twin Shisa may spend Activation Counters from this card to pay for actions.  These models are only considered Exhausted while there are no Activation Counters on this card.  Twin Shisa share a single Ki Pool. When a Twin Shisa would gain Ki Tokens, instead place those Ki Tokens on this card. Either Twin Shisa may spend Ki Tokens from this card to pay for Ki Feats, Boosts, and other effects.  This model cannot be Healed.

fields.name: Okishisa A
fields.uniqueEffects: During the Starting Phase choose one of the following to affect this model until the End Phase: • This model gains Move stat of 4 • This model gains Disturb Flow (1/6") • Enemy models within 3" cannot declare Scenario Actions.  This model cannot be Healed.

fields.name: Master Koju
fields.uniqueEffects: In the Starting Phase this model gains an additional Activation Counter. This model is not affected by Enemy Ki Feats or unique effects that remove Activation Counters.  This model can never gain Slow, models in a Melee Exchange with this model cannot benefit from Lightning Reflexes.  Kami models cannot Target or select this model with Melee or Ranged Attacks unless they begin their activation in BtB with this model. This model’s Melee Attacks do not cause damage.

fields.name: Master Ekusa
fields.uniqueEffects:
While this model is in play, when a Friendly model spends a Virtue Token you may choose the following effects: • Void: This model gains 2 Ki Tokens. • Inner Peace: This model removes all Berserk, Blind, Diseased, Fire, Impetuous, Poison, Spirit Block or Stunned Markers.
While this model is in play, when a Friendly model spends a Virtue Token you may choose the following effects: • Void: This model gains 2 Ki Tokens. • Inner Peace: This model removes all Berserk, Blind, Diseased, Fire, Impetuous, Poison, Spirit Block or Stunned Markers. • Technique: Enemy models may not declare Special Abilities while in a Melee Exchange with this model until the current activation is complete.

fields.name: Master Akari
fields.uniqueEffects: During a Melee Exchange, after removing or adding dice, this model may remove its highest Attack dice and add a Defence dice of the same value before determining final results.

fields.name: Kyuubi
fields.uniqueEffects: This model gains Assassin when involved in a Melee Exchange with a Shisai or Shugenja.

fields.name: Kuma
fields.uniqueEffects: During the Starting Phase if this model does not have a Virtue Token it gains 1. When this model spends a Virtue Token you may choose 1 of the following effects: • This model gains Aware until the End Phase • This model gains Ranged Defence (2) until the End Phase • 1 model in BtB with this model gains a Stunned Marker

fields.name: Kota - Human Form
fields.uniqueEffects: Kota's Fox Form and Human Form are considered the same model when creating a Warband. When Deploying this model you must choose to Deploy either the Kota - Fox Form model, or the Kota - Human Form model, and begin the game with that profile card.

fields.name: Kosuke
fields.uniqueEffects: This model may choose 1 Special Attack and 1 Special Defence and apply both to the same Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Koji
fields.uniqueEffects: While within 2" of a non-Unsui Monk this model gains Kata.

fields.name: Kintaru
fields.uniqueEffects: This model does not need LoS for its Cormorant Ranged Attack and ignores Cover modifiers. This model can make only 1 Cormorant Ranged Attack per turn.

fields.name: Kaito
fields.uniqueEffects: At the start of the game, once terrain has been deployed but before players have deployed their Warbands, deploy the Tilled Field terrain (Difficult, Clear, Zero).

fields.name: Hisao
fields.uniqueEffects: This model may only Target Villager models with its Inspiration Feat.

fields.name: Haru
fields.uniqueEffects: This model does not need LoS for its Cormorant Ranged Attack and ignores Cover modifiers. This model can make only 1 Cormorant Ranged Attack per turn.

fields.name: Atsuko
fields.uniqueEffects: • Once per game, all Villagers gain Fearless and Last Stand until the End Phase • Friendly Villager models gain Steadfast • Each Starting Phase gain one permitted Event - Trap card of which you currently have none.  Permitted [Animal, Villager, Kami, Yokai, Ronin Kami, Ronin Villager, Ronin Yokai]

fields.name: Master Enos
fields.uniqueEffects: At the start of each turn this model may inflict one Wound on any number of Friendly Lesser Kami within 6XX. If it does, it loses the Monk type and gains an ability based on the type of Kami wounded.  • Water Kami – This model Heals 2 Wounds. • Fire Kami – This model’s weapons gain Fire (2/1) until the End Phase. • Air Kami – This model gains +1 Move and Lightfooted until the End Phase. • Void Kami – This model gains 2 Ki Tokens. • Metal Kami – This Model gains Powerful Attack (0) until the End Phase. • Earth Kami – This model gains Tough (1) until the End Phase.

fields.name: Niseru
fields.uniqueEffects:
Models within 3" of this model cannot be Surprised.
Enemy models in BtB with this model increase the cost of all Ki Feats, and Special Attacks & Defences by 1. This model may be recruited into any Warband that includes Taiki.

fields.name: Taiki
fields.uniqueEffects: This model cannot have Enhancement cards that have Restriction [Monk].

fields.name: Mina
fields.uniqueEffects: This model is always treated as having Cover.

fields.name: Hofuku
fields.uniqueEffects: This Weapons Strength Modifier is variable. X is equal to the number of Marked Wounds on the Target.

fields.name: Juko
fields.uniqueEffects: When in BtB with this model Enemy models lose the Intagible trait. This model gains Assassin while involved in a Melee Exchange with a Kami model.

fields.name: Senshi
fields.uniqueEffects:
This Weapons Strength Modifier is variable. X is equal to the current Turn number.
After an Enemy Effect Moves or Places this model, once the Effect is resolved, you may Place this model within 2" of its current location. This model may be Placed into BtB with an Enemy model when using this unique effect.

fields.name: The Nine-Tailed Fox
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model makes a Challenge or Opposed Test, it may re-roll any number of itsa own dice in that test. Dice may only be re-rolled once due to this ability. This model may only be included in Followers of Inari Theme.

fields.name: Tengoko
fields.uniqueEffects: This model may only be included in Followers of Inari Theme.

fields.name: Takeru - Human Form
fields.uniqueEffects: • Enemy models lose Rise and Last Stand while in a Melee Exchange with this model. • Instead of making a Damage Roll against Durable models, this model will always cause 1 Wound, ignoring Tough. • This model gains Assassin while involved in a Melee Exchange with a Soulless model.

fields.name: The White-Faced Fox - Human Form
fields.uniqueEffects: While attempting to Target this model, Enemy models lose Sixth Sense.  At the start of this model's activation choose one of the following: • Walk this model 1" • This modelgains Intangible until the End of the activation.

fields.name: Takeru - Fox Form
fields.uniqueEffects: Takeru's Fox Form and Human Form are considered the same model when creating a Warband. When Deploying this model you must choose to Deploy either the Takeru - Fox Form model, or the Takeru - Human Form model, and begin the game with that profile card.

fields.name: The White-Faced Fox - Fox Form
fields.uniqueEffects:
When Deploying this model you must Deploy the White-Faced Fox - Fox Form model and begin the game with that profile card.  While attempting to Target this model, Enemy models lose Sixth Sense.
The White-Faced Fox's Fox Form and Human Form are considered the same model when creating a Warband.

fields.name: Kuoto - Fox Form
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model may only be included in the Followers of Inari Theme.
Kuoto's Fox Form and Human Form are considered the same model when creating a Warband. When Deploying this model you must Deploy the Kuoto - Fox Form model and begin the game with that profile card.

fields.name: Kami of the Summer Storm
fields.uniqueEffects:
Each time this model makes a successful Ranged Attack it must use its Raijin's Rage feat if it has more than two Ki Tokens and a valid Target.  When this model makes a successful Ranged or Melee Attack, the enemy model gains a Stunned Marker.  When this model would make a Damage Roll for a successful Melee or Ranged attack, instead place the Enemy model anywhere within 1" of its current location.  Whenever another model on the Battlefield is Placed by an effect not on this card, this model gains 1 Ki Token.
This model's Melee Attacks do no Damage. On a successful Ranged Attack Place the Target anywhere within 1" of its current location but not into an Enemy model's ZoC.
This card represents three different models, each with their own abilities.  A Warband may not recruit multiples of the same Monkey.  While within 3” of this model, other models cannot be Surprised.  Koji’s Pack models may be included in any Themed Warband that permits Koji.
Enemy models in BtB with this model increase the cost of all Ki Feats and Special Attacks and Defences by 1.
Enemy models in BtB with this model treat melee dice with a value of 6 as a value of 5 instead.
Models using the Flank Trait may not be deployed within 3” of this model unless this would leave no valid deployment.

fields.name: Kawa no Rojin
fields.uniqueEffects:
During Ki Generation, one Friendly Villager within 6” of this model may gain an additional Ki Token.  During the Starting Phase, this model gains a Luck Token. Whenever a Friendly model within 6” makes a Fear Test, Attack Roll, Defence Roll, Damage Roll or Opposed Ki Test this model may spend the token to reroll one of the dice.  When this model declares a Charge Action, this model may Move through Destructible terrain; if you do, remove the terrain from the battlefield.
While this model is in play, when a Friendly Villager model spends a Virtue Token you may choose one of the following effects until the End Phase: • The model gains Tireless • The model gains Last Stand • The model gains Fearless • The model gains Tough (1)

fields.name: Monkey
fields.uniqueEffects: Play when an Enemy model without the Intangible traits declares any Action in which it will move. The model makes a Size Challenge Test (6). If unsuccessful, the current activation ends, the model gains an Immobilised Marker, it loses an Activation Counter and its action is considered resolved.  This is a Trap effect.

fields.name: Xi-Han
fields.uniqueEffects:
Successful Ranged Attacks cause no Damage. Instead choose the Target, non-Soulless model to gain one of the following effects: • 1 Blind Marker • 1 Impetuous Marker and Aggressive  until the End Phase • 1 Frightened Marker
Xi-Han and Zoo are considered the same model when creating a Warband.

fields.name: Tra-Peng
fields.uniqueEffects: During the Starting Phase choose a Target Enemy model within 8" of this model. That model gains a Stunned Marker.

fields.name: Okina & Oto
fields.uniqueEffects: When a Friendly model spends a Virtue Token while this model is in play, it gains one of the following until the End Phase: • +1 Melee Weapon Strength • Last Stand • Bravery

fields.name: Kokoro, the Harvester
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model may not have Enhancement cards attached to it.
If this model successfully Damages a model with its Ranged Attack, place a Darkness Counter on this model. This model’s Ranged Attack gains +1 Strength for each Darkness Counter on this model.

fields.name: Kaihei Alpha
fields.uniqueEffects: Other Friendly Kaihei models in the Warband gain Bravery and Group.

fields.name: Giant Cave Bat
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model causes Wounds to a non-Soulless model during a Melee Exchange when using this weapon Weapon it may Heal one Wound. This model gains +1 Move and Sweep Attack (0) when Targeting an Enemy model with Wounds marked on its Wound Track with a Charge Action or when involved in a Melee Exchange with an Enemy model with Wounds marked on its profile card

fields.name: Cave Bat Rider
fields.uniqueEffects:
When this model causes Wounds to a non-Soulless model during a Melee Exchange when using this weapon Weapon it may Heal one Wound.
This model gains +1 Move and Sweep Attack (0) when Targeting an Enemy model with Wounds marked on its Wound Track with a Charge Action or when involved in a Melee Exchange with an Enemy model with Wounds marked on its profile card.

fields.name: Boba
fields.uniqueEffects:
When an Enemy model suffers Wounds from a successful Melee or Ranged Attack by this model it gains a Stunned Marker.
This model loses Camouflage until the End Phase when it makes a Ranged Attack Action.

fields.name: Bakemono Boomer A
fields.uniqueEffects: If this model has Wounds marked on its Wound Track it gains Aggressive, Combo Attack (0) and Fear (6).  This model automatically passes Fear Tests caused by Small Based models.

fields.name: Lost Slave B
fields.uniqueEffects: Bakemono models activating in BtB with this model gain Charging Bonus [Steadfast] but if they fail a Fear Test they take 3 Wounds (Ignoring Tough) immediately.

fields.name: Kaihei D
fields.uniqueEffects: The activating Bakemono gains the following ranged weapon until the current activation is resolved. On a successful ranged attack the Target gains a Stunned marker.

fields.name: Ig
fields.uniqueEffects: • When a Bakemono would generate Ki Tokens (or otherwise gain Ki Tokens)  instead place those Ki Tokens on this card. • Whenever a Bakemono model would spend Ki Tokens you may spend them from this card to pay for Ki Feats, Boosts or other effects. • Friendly Bakemono may use feats listed on this card.   • A player may only have one Bakemono Horde card.

fields.name: Zoo
fields.uniqueEffects: When Reiji Kinoko expires during the End Phase, replace this model with the Xi-Han model. Recover or Inflict Wounds so that Xi-Han’s profile has the same number of Wounds marked as Zoo. Transfer State Markers, Enhancements and any Tokens to Zoo’s profile card.

fields.name: Yami'mure
fields.uniqueEffects: While this model is in play, this model’s feat may be used by Friendly Bakemono models as if it were on the Bakemono Horde card.

fields.name: Foon Gus
fields.uniqueEffects: While this model has an Impetuous Marker, it gains Banzai! Until the start of the game, this model gains the Shugenja type. When this model is Killed, Enemy models in BtB gain a Poison (1) Marker.

fields.name: Rashka the Devastator
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model has the Initiative in a Melee Exchange, Enemy models cannot reroll Defence dice during that exchange.  This model may move through Destructible terrain; if you do, remove the terrain from the battlefield.

fields.name: Kemono, the Savage
fields.uniqueEffects: During the Ki Generation step this model’s Controller chooses whether to use Kemono’s profile card or Ushi’s profile card for the turn. • Heal or mark Wounds so that both profile cards have the same Wounds unmarked. • Transfer Ki Tokens, State Markers, Enhancement, and any tokens to the chosen profile card.  Kemono & Ushi are considered the same model when creating a Warband.   This model may Move through Destructible terrain; if you do, remove the terrain from the battlefield.

fields.name: Ushi the Sadistic
fields.uniqueEffects:
During the Ki Generation step this model’s Controller chooses whether to use Kemono’s profile card or Ushi’s profile card for the turn. • Heal or mark Wounds so that both profile cards have the same Wounds unmarked. • Transfer Ki Tokens, State Markers, Enhancement, and any tokens to the chosen profile card.  Kemono & Ushi are considered the same model when creating a Warband.
Models suffering Wounds from this model’s Ranged Attack gain Cowardly until the End Phase.

fields.name: Waka, the Rampager
fields.uniqueEffects:
When Waka declares a Wait Action and spends 2 Ki Tokens to remove Destructible terrain he is in BtB with, if he currently has no Ammo Tokens, he will also gain 1 Ammo Token and he may immediately make a Ranged Attack.
When this model makes a Ranged Attack deploy a 30mm base [Impassable, Blocking,Small] [Destructible] terrain element in contact with the target.

fields.name: Zuba the All-Seeing
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model begins the game with a Luck Token. Whenever a Friendly model within 6” makes a Fear Test, Attack Roll, Defence Roll, Damage Roll or Opposed Ki Test this model may spend the Luck Token to reroll one of the dice.
Ranged Attacks made by this weapon ignore Camouflage and Cover.

fields.name: Onyomi
fields.uniqueEffects: This model may only target Onisho models with its Inspiration Ki Feat.  Oni and Onisho models, except Kijo models, activating within 4"" of this model gain a Frightened Marker until the End Phase.

fields.name: Yusha, the Vindictive
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model may only target Animal models with it's Inspiration Feat.
Models suffering Wounds from this model’s Ranged Attack gain Cowardly until the End Phase.

fields.name: Yokozuna Akashi
fields.uniqueEffects: While this model has 2 or more unmarked Wound boxes, reduce any Damage taken to ensure this model has at least one unmarked Wound box.

fields.name: Tsubaki
fields.uniqueEffects: On a successful Attack with this weapon, instead of a Damage Roll, centre a 1" Pulse on the target; all models within the Pulse gain one Blind Marker.

fields.name: Sukuratchi
fields.uniqueEffects: This model gains +1 Melee Pool and a +2 Melee Strength modifier in Melee Exchanges against Animal models.

fields.name: Saki
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model suffers wounds from a Melee Attack, the attacker gains one Spirit Block Marker.  In the Starting Phase of each turn, this model gains a Luck Token. Whenever a Friendly model within 6" makes a Fear Test, Attack Roll, Defence Roll, Damage Roll or Opposed Ki Test this model may spend the token to re-roll one of the dice.  During the Starting Phase you may remove this model from play, roll 3D6 and put the dice to one side but keeping the results; or keep this model in play and roll a D6 and put the dice to one side but keeping the result.  At any point during the turn when a Player would make a dice roll, before dice are rolled you can substitute one of your dice that would be rolled for one of these dice, any other dice are rolled as normal, but the result of this dice is the one chosen.

fields.name: Rakki B
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model activates it gains Fear (3) until the end of its activation.

fields.name: Old Zo
fields.uniqueEffects: If during the Starting Phase this model is not in BtB with a Friendly model with the Command [Animal] trait, it gains a Berserk Marker.

fields.name: Oda & Tautolu
fields.uniqueEffects:
While this model is in play, when a Friendly Buto, Jumo or Monk model spends a Virtue Token you may choose one of the following effects:  • Reduce the cost of this model’s Special Attacks or Defences by (1) • Sweep Attack (1) and Sweep Defence (1) • Throw Attack (1) and Throw Defence (1) • Immovable
This model may only target Buto, Jumo and Monks with its Inspiration Ki Feat. This model cannot be recruited into the same Warband as Oda or Tautolu. This model cannot declare Run or Charge Actions. When this model is Killed, replace this model and profile card with those of Oda.

fields.name: Misao
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model suffers Wounds from an Enemy model’s Ranged or Melee Attack that model gains one Spirit Block Marker.

fields.name: Manu
fields.uniqueEffects: This model may use the Bodyguard trait while Exhausted. When this model declares use of it's Bodyguard it gains Fearless until the current action is resolved.

fields.name: Kaede
fields.uniqueEffects: This model cannot target Ken. This model can draw LoS through Ken and ignores Ken and Ken’s ZoC for all game purposes. This model cannot move through Ken.  Jo: Begin the game with Jo. Each model using Fortune may re-flip the coin. In the Starting Phase of any turn you may lose Jo and gain Ha for the rest of the game. Ha: This model loses Insignificant and Slow. Kyu: In the final turn of the game, while this model is in play, every time a model with RC>10 is removed from play, another model in the same Warband loses an Activation Counter.

fields.name: Honoko
fields.uniqueEffects:
When an Enemy Animal model attempts a Melee or Charge Action against this model, it must make a Ki Challenge Test (5); if it fails, its activation ends and it loses an Activation Counter.
Models suffering Wounds from this model’s Ranged Attack gain Cowardly until the End Phase.

fields.name: Hanami
fields.uniqueEffects: While this model is in play, Friendly Models with Control Markers do not remove Activation Counters or Control Markers when they participate in a Melee Exchange initiated by Enemy models.  While this model is in play, Friendly Rose models reduce the cost of any  Boosts they have to 2.

fields.name: Giichi
fields.uniqueEffects: Models suffering Wounds from this model’s Ranged Attack gain Cowardly until the End Phase.

fields.name: Fai-ginn
fields.uniqueEffects:
Urchin models in Fai-ginn’s Warband gain Camouflage (4"), Dodge (+1) and when declaring a Scenario Action Urchins may make a Walk before or after resolving the action while Fai-ginn is in play. During the End Phase you can transfer an Enhancement card on this model to a Friendly model within 8".
This model cannot have Enhancement cards bought for it when recruiting the Warband.

fields.name: Dafukaia
fields.uniqueEffects: If this model is included in your Warband you may also include Ronin Fire Kami. While within 2" of this model, Fire Kami models gain Aggressive and Brutal (1).

fields.name: Jum
fields.uniqueEffects:
If an Attack with this weapon is successful and the individual dice results of the Damage Roll are the same number this weapon gains Pierce (3) for that Damage Roll.
If this model is involved in a Melee Exchange with a Surprised Enemy model, double this model's Melee Pool until the end of the Melee Exchange.

fields.name: Fuku
fields.uniqueEffects:
Successful attacks with this Weapon do no damage but the Target gains a Mishap Token. Before a Damage Roll on a model with a Mishap Token, that model's Controller must flip a coin and call heads or tails. If they call successfully, that model takes damage as normal, otherwise that model takes double damage. After the damage roll, remove one Mishap Token.
While this model is in play, Friendly models may spend Luck Tokens to allow a Friendly model within 6" to re-flip a coin. Whenever an Effect causes dice to be re-rolled, this model gains 1 Ki Token.

fields.name: Tomo
fields.uniqueEffects: At the start of this model's activation, if this model has Ki Tokens equal to its maximum Ki you may ignore the 'Once Per Turn' box for the Kill or Cure Ki Feat. If the box is filled in, you may still use the Ki Feat.

fields.name: Lama'a
fields.uniqueEffects:
While a Friendly Brother Zandaka is in play, this model ignores the BtB restriction when using its Distraction Ki Feat.
Before making a Ranged Attack against this model or Brother Zandaka, the Activating model must make a Fear Test using this model's Fear Trait for the Challenge Number. If it fails the Fear Test, that model's activation ends. Regardless of the action declared, remove one Activation Counter.

fields.name: Oda
fields.uniqueEffects:
While this model is in play, when a Friendly Buto, Jumo or Monk model spends a Virtue Token you may choose one of the following effects:  • Reduce the cost of this model’s Special Attacks or Defences by (1) • Sweep Attack (1) and Sweep Defence (1) • Throw Attack (1) and Throw Defence (1) • Immovable
This model may only target Buto, Jumo and Monks with its Idolize Ki Feat.
During the Starting Phase if this model has no Ammo Tokens, it can remove all Activation Counters and gain 4 Ammo Tokens.

fields.name: Umeka
fields.uniqueEffects: If an Enemy model is removed from play due to Bleed Damage in the End Phase, this model may Heal all its Wounds.

fields.name: Risu
fields.uniqueEffects: If an Enemy model is removed from play due to Poison Damage in the End Phase, this model may Heal all its Wounds.

fields.name: Ibara
fields.uniqueEffects: If an Enemy model is removed from play due to Fire Damage in the End Phase, this model may Heal all its Wounds.

fields.name: Araka
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model uses Oni Rage, it loses Slow and Soulless and it gains +1 Melee Pool, Unblockable (1) and gains a Berserk Marker. Also in the End Phase, the Opponent places a Control Marker on this model.  This model may not use Oni Rage while Controlled. When this model causes an Enemy model to be removed from play as a result of a Melee Exchange, its 'Corpse' Ranged Weapon gains an Ammo Token.

fields.name: Taka
fields.uniqueEffects: If this model is removed from play, also remove any Friendly Wrath from play.

fields.name: Gok
fields.uniqueEffects: Friendly Kairai models within 3" may re-roll Rise Tests. Friendly Kairai models within 6" gain 1 Ki in the Ki Generation step each turn.

fields.name: Ikiryo
fields.uniqueEffects: During the Starting Phase this model may become Exhausted. If it does, remove all Control Markers from this model and transfer one Ki Token from all models within 8" of this model to this model. Each model that transferred a Ki Token suffers one Wound. Wounds caused by this effect ignore Armor and Tough.

fields.name: Kato, the Puppet Master
fields.uniqueEffects: If this model is removed from play also remove any Friendly Marionette model from play.

fields.name: Rokuro
fields.uniqueEffects:
While this model is not in BtB with an Enemy model, Enemy Tengu models beginning their activation within 3” must succeed on a Ki Challenge Test (5) or melee this model. Models that fail gain Vengeance [Rokuro] until the action is resolved.
If this model has no Ammo Tokens this weapon loses Brutal (1).
A model damaged by this model’s Ranged Attacks loses Cloudwalk until the End Phase.

fields.name: Senbo
fields.uniqueEffects: Models cannot Leech Ki from this model. This model cannot have fewer Enhancements attached to it than any other model in the Warband. If this model is removed from play, also remove any Friendly Envy from play.

fields.name: Souta
fields.uniqueEffects: If this model is removed from play, also remove any Friendly Sloth from play.

fields.name: The Gaki
fields.uniqueEffects: Once per turn when a non-Soulless Enemy model is reduced to 0 Wounds by this model, this model may, if not Exhausted, become Exhausted and Heal all damage.

fields.name: The Penanggalan
fields.uniqueEffects: During the End Phase if this model is in BtB with a non-Soulless model it Held, this model gains Regenerate (2) and the Held model suffers two Wounds ignoring Tough.

fields.name: The Wanyudo
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model suffers Wounds from a Melee Attack, the attacking model gains a Fire (1) Marker. During the Starting Phase models in BtB with this model gain a Fire (1) Marker.

fields.name: The Wraith
fields.uniqueEffects:
When this model inflicts Wounds through a successful Melee Attack, it gains a number of Ki Tokens equal to the Wounded model’s Ki Statistic.
This model starts the game with 10 Ki Tokens.

fields.name: Waku, the Soul Collector
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model’s successful Ranged Attacks cause no Damage Roll but the Target gains a Fire Marker of value equal to the Success Level of the Attack (maximum 3).
When a non-Soulless, non-Insignificant model is Killed within 6" of this model; this model gains an Activation Counter. When an Enemy model removes a Death Sentence Marker it gains a Spirit Block Marker.  If a model with a Death Sentence Marker is Killed this model Heals two Wounds.

fields.name: Yugio
fields.uniqueEffects: This model loses Rise while Prone. In the End Phase, if this model is not in BtB with another Kairai this model becomes Prone.

fields.name: Kusatta Kairai B
fields.uniqueEffects: This model loses Rise while Prone. In the End Phase, if this model is not in BtB with another Kairai this model becomes Prone.

fields.name: Kairai Villager B
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model suffers Wounds from a Melee Attack, the Attacker gains a Poison (1) Marker. When this model is reduced to 0 Wounds remove it from play and each model within 2" gains a Poison (1) Marker.

fields.name: Small Rat Swarm C
fields.uniqueEffects: The Large Swarm of Rat’s Melee Pool and Ki Statistic is equal to the number of Wounds it has remaining unmarked on its Wound Track. During the End Phase you may remove a Friendly Rat model in BtB with this model from play. If you do, this model Heals one Wound.

fields.name: Envy
fields.uniqueEffects:
When this model inflicts Wounds through a successful Melee Attack, it gains a number of Ki Tokens equal to the Wounded model’s Ki Statistic.
When this model suffers Wounds from a non-Soulless model in a Melee Exchange, the attacking model gains 1 Control Token.

fields.name: Wrath
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model inflicts Wounds through a successful Melee Attack, it gains a number of Ki Tokens equal to the Wounded model’s Ki Statistic.

fields.name: Sloth
fields.uniqueEffects:
When this model inflicts Wounds through a successful Melee Attack, it gains a number of Ki Tokens equal to the Wounded model’s Ki Statistic.
When this model suffers Wounds from a successful Melee Attack, the Attacker gains one Immobilised Marker.

fields.name: Marionette
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model is the activating model, and in BtB with an Enemy model, before any Melee Exchange, Kato may make an Opposed Ki Test against the Enemy model. If Kato is successful place a number of Control Markers on the Target’s profile card equal to the number of Ki Tokens currently on this model then remove this model from play.

fields.name: Akuba
fields.uniqueEffects:
Whenever this model deals Damage as a result of a Ranged Attack a Friendly Yuta model Heals 1 Damage.
Whenever this model must spend any number of Ki Tokens for a Feat, it may instead suffer any amount of Damage; for each point of Damage it spends 1 fewer Ki Token. Gashadokuro models in the same Warband as this model gain Regenerate (+1).

fields.name: Josei
fields.uniqueEffects:
Whenever a Kairai deals Damage to an Enemy model as a result of a Melee Attack this model Heals 1 wound.
When this model Kills a non-Soulless Enemy model with a Ranged Attack, replace the Enemy model with a Risen Kairai. Whenever this model deals Damage as a result of a Ranged Attack a Friendly Yuta model Heals 1 Damage.
Kairai models in the same Warband as this model gain Regenerate (1). Whenever this model must spend any number of Ki Tokens for a Feat, it may instead suffer any amount of Damage, for each point of Damage it spends 1 fewer Ki Token.

fields.name: Shojo
fields.uniqueEffects:
Whenever this model deals Damage as a result of a Ranged Attack a Friendly Yuta model Heals 1 Damage.
Whenever this model must spend any number of Ki Tokens for a Feat, it may instead suffer any amount of Damage; for each point of Damage it spends 1 fewer Ki Token. Burakumin models in the same Warband as this model gain Regenerate (1).

fields.name: Hikari
fields.uniqueEffects: If this model declares an action that would Surprise an Enemy model, it gains +2 to its Move Statistic.

fields.name: Minarai
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model succeeds in a Rise Test it gains 1 Ki Token.

fields.name: Gluttony
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model inflicts Wounds through a successful Melee Attack, it gains a number of Ki Tokens equal to the Wounded model’s Ki Statistic.

fields.name: Shokuji
fields.uniqueEffects: If this model is removed from play, also remove any Friendly Gluttony from play.

fields.name: Fuwa Kaidan
fields.uniqueEffects:
Instead of a Damage Roll, remove 1 Ki Token from the Enemy model and this model gains that Ki Token.
When this model would be removed from play, instead Deploy it in BtB with a Friendly Tsuridourou terrain element. In a scenario with Scenario Objectives, when using this Effect, this model may instead Deploy in BtB with a Friendly Scenario Objective that is not within 4° of an Enemy model. If neither option is available this model is removed from play as usual.

fields.name: Sagoya Kaidan
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model inflicts Wounds through a successful Melee Attack, it gains a number of Ki Tokens equal to the Wounded model's Ki Statistic and the Enemy model gains a Frightened Marker.

fields.name: Maiden of Sagoya
fields.uniqueEffects:
Replace the Enchanted Hair ranged weapon with Moontouched Hair. When this model makes an Attack with an Entangling weapon or a Grapple Attack, the Attack can cause damage in addition to normal effects.  Requirement [The Harionago]
Attached model gains +1 Melee Pool and Endurance. Replace the Flaming Wheel melee weapon with the Iron Wheel melee weapon.  Requirement [Wanyudo]

fields.name: Yori
fields.uniqueEffects:
If this Attack cause Danage then the Target is moved 1" directly toward this model. This model can only make 1 Thrown Harpoon Attack per turn.
Succesful Ranged Attacls woth this weapon cause no Damage, increase the value of all Fire Markers on the target by 1.

fields.name: Taru
fields.uniqueEffects: This model only removes an Ammo Token when it makes a succesful Ranged Attack.  If this model has no Ammo Tokens on its Net Weapon it loses the Net Weapon.

fields.name: Miyakomo Asami
fields.uniqueEffects: This model's Ranged Attack must declare a Special Attack.

fields.name: Jung Minato
fields.uniqueEffects: While this model is in play, the Melee Weapons of Kaizoku in this model's Warband gain Powerful Attack (1).

fields.name: Jung Mari
fields.uniqueEffects: Kaizoku in this model's Warband gain Scout (0/2").

fields.name: Jung Hibiki
fields.uniqueEffects: While this model is in play, Kaizoku models in this model's Warband gain Evasive and their Melee Weapons gain Sidestep Defence (0).

fields.name: Hideaki
fields.uniqueEffects: While Prone this model may declare the Wait Action instead of the Stand Up Action (Even if in BtB with an Enemy model) and it gains +1 Ki Stat, Armour (3) and Durable until it loses the Prone State.  This model may not declare Special Attacks or Defences while Prone.  If this model uses its Scout trait, it begins the game Prone with 2 Ki Tokens.

fields.name: Duri
fields.uniqueEffects:
Once per game at the start of this model's activation this model can remove all Reload Markers.  This model cannot declare Run or Charge actions.  This model cannot attach the Peg Leg Enhancement card.
This model's Melee and Ki statistics are variable. X is equal to their remaining Wounds.

fields.name: Horseshoe Crab
fields.uniqueEffects: This model cannot declare Melee or Charge Actions and may declare Wait Actions while in BtB with Enemy Models.

fields.name: Giant Fiddler Crab
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model is the active model and in BtB with an Enemy model, the Enemy model must make a Move Challenge Test (6). If it fails, place this model Elsewhere and the Enemy model gains the following traits: Unstable, Weak (Melee), Slow. The model may take a Wait Action. If it does, or if the model is killed, it loses the traits and it's Controller may place this model from Elsewhere to witin 2" of the Enemy model.

fields.name: Arata
fields.uniqueEffects:
Kancho: Jung Hibiki Juhin: Jung Tora  •During the Start Phase, choose 1 Friendly Kaizoku model to gain one Activation Counter. •When a Friendly Kaizoku model succesfully uses Sidestep Defence, it gains 1 Ki Token.  Permitted [Any Jung Profile, Ronin Yokai, Ronin Kaizoku] Exsclusion [Other Kancho or Juhin than those listed, Kami]
This model only removes an Ammo Token when it makes a succesful Ranged Attack.  If this model has no Ammo Tokens on its Net Weapon it loses the Net Weapon.

fields.name: Jung Tora
fields.uniqueEffects: Kaizoku models within this model's Leadership range gain Bravery and Bodyguard [Jung Tora](2").  When this model is removed from play by an Enemy attack or effect, all models in the Opposing Warband gain a Death Sentence Marker.

fields.name: Jori
fields.uniqueEffects: If this Attack causes Damage then the Target is moved 1" directly towards this model.  This model can only make one Ranged Harpoon Attack per turn.

fields.name: Ryujin
fields.uniqueEffects:
The area within X" of this model is considered Difficult Terrain. Models in this area gain Immune [Fire] and Cover. X is the current turn number.
If a Water Lesser Kami model ends its activation in BtB with this model, remove it from play. This model gains Ki Tokens equal to the removed Water Lesser Kami's remaining Ki Tokens.

fields.name: Miyakomo Korra
fields.uniqueEffects: This model's Ranged Attack must declare a Special Attack.

fields.name: Moyasu
fields.uniqueEffects: During the End Phase, after any Pass Tokens are discarded, this model and models within 2" of this model gain a Fire (2) Marker. This model always benefits from Cover. This model may not be recruited into a Warband with the Docks of Ryu theme.

fields.name: Taiho
fields.uniqueEffects:
The Opposing player may not nominate a new Target during Ranged Attacks made with this Weapon. Bodyguard may be used as normal.
This model may not Walk as part of a Ranged Attack Action. This model begins the game with 2 Reload Markers.

fields.name: Kurutta
fields.uniqueEffects: On a successful Attack with this Weapon, instead of a Damage Roll, centre a 1 " Pulse on the Target; all models within the Pulse gain a Fire (2) Marker.

fields.name: Renishi
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model suffers Wounds in a Melee Exchange, after the activation is complete, the Attacker gains a Bleed (1) Marker.

fields.name: Hiretsuna
fields.uniqueEffects: At the start of this model's activation, choose 1 of the following: • This model gains Poison (1/1) until the end of the activation • If this model is not in BtB with or LoS of an Enemy model, place it within 3" of its current location.

fields.name: Hiroto, Drunken Master
fields.uniqueEffects: For each VP scored by this model's Warband, this model gains Dodge (+1) and -1 to its Ki Statistic. When this model's Warband scores a VP, remove all this model's Ki Tokens.

fields.name: Kami of Blighted Earth
fields.uniqueEffects:
Enemy models consider the area within 2" of this model a [Clear, Difficult, Zero] terrain element.
When this model suffers Wounds from a Melee Attack, the Attacking model gains 1 Spirit Block Marker.

fields.name: Kami of Choking Fog
fields.uniqueEffects:
Enemy models consider the area within 2" of this model a [Normal, Obscurring, Huge] terrain element.
During the Starting Phase choose 1 of the following effects: • Remove this model from play and 1 Enemy model within 2" gains a Blind Marker • 1 Enemy model within 2" gains a Stunned Marker
When this model suffers Wounds from a Melee Attack, the Attacking model gains 1 Stunned Marker.
Models hit by this model's Ranged Attack suffer no Damage Roll. Instead the model gains 1 Stunned Marker.

fields.name: Kami of Evening Flame
fields.uniqueEffects:
After any Melee Exchange in which this model suffers Damage, at the end of the Activation, the opposing model gains a Fire (2) Marker.
During the Starting Phase you may choose one of the following: • Remove this model from play and all models within 2” gain a Fire (2) Marker. • Up to 1 model in BtB gains +1 Strength and Fire (1/1) on its Melee Weapons until the End Phase.

fields.name: Kami of Reflection
fields.uniqueEffects:
When this model suffers Wounds in a Melee Exchange, at the end of the Exchange the attacker suffers one Wound ignoring Tough.
During the Starting Phase you may choose one of the following: • Remove this model from play and all models gain Cover and Slow until the End Phase.  This is a Blizzard. • Up to 1 Friendly model in BtB gains a Mirror Token.
When a model with a Mirror Token becomes the Target of an Enemy Ki Feat you may spend the Mirror Token to cause the Ki Feat to instead Target the model using the Ki Feat as if that model were the original Target (ignoring restrictions).  This model does not gain Slow from Blizzard.

fields.name: Kami of Sapping Silt
fields.uniqueEffects:
During the Starting Phase you may choose one of the following: • Remove this model from play and choose an Enemy model within 2". Remove 1 Activation Counter from that model • Up to 1 model within 2" suffers -2 Move until the End Phase
This model's Melee Attacks do no Damage. On a successful Melee Attack the Target becomes Immobilised.

fields.name: Kami of the Eternal Earth
fields.uniqueEffects:
When this model suffers Wounds in a Melee Exchange, the Attacker suffers 1 Wound ignoring Tough.
During the Starting Phase choose 1 of the following effects: • Remove this model from play and 1 model within 2" gains Durable until the End Phase • 1 model in BtB gains Armour (2) until the End Phase

fields.name: Kami of the Morning Dew
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model's Melee Attacks do no Damage. On a successful Melee Attack the Target becomes Immobilised.
When this model suffers Wounds in a Melee Exchange, the Attacker gains Slow until the End Phase.
During the Starting Phase choose 1 of the following effects: • Place a 5" circular [Difficult, Clear, Zero] terrain element centered on this model, then remove this model from play. The terrain element remains until the End Phase • 1 model in BtB Heals 2 Wounds

fields.name: Kami of the Strong West Wind
fields.uniqueEffects:
When this model suffers Wounds, after the current activation resolves, place it within 2" of its current location.
During the Starting Phase choose 1 of the following effects: • Remove this model from play and all models within 2" may be placed within 2" of their current location • 1 model in BtB gains +1 Move and Lightfooted until the End Phase
Models hit by this model's Ranged Attack suffer no Damage. On a successful Ranged Attack Place the Target anywhere within 1" of its current location but not into an Enemy model's ZoC.

fields.name: Kappa
fields.uniqueEffects: During the End Phase if this model is in BtB with an Enemy non-Soulless model that is Held, the Enemy model suffers 2 Wounds and gains a Spirit Block Marker. Also, this model gains a number of Ki Tokens equal to the Enemy model's Ki Statistic and the Enemy model loses that amount of Ki (if it has any). If this model becomes Prone, it loses all Ki tokens and gains a Spirit Block Marker.

fields.name: Koshimori Yukio
fields.uniqueEffects: This model cannot declare Scenario Actions.

fields.name: Sojobo
fields.uniqueEffects: Models lose Rise and Last Stand while in a Melee Exchange with a model using this weapon. Against Durable models, instead of making a Damage Roll, always cause 1 Damage (ignoring Tough).

fields.name: Temo
fields.uniqueEffects: This model's Melee Attacks do no Damage. Instead choose the Target, non-Soulless model to gain 1 of the following: • 1 Blind Marker • 1 Impetuous Marker and Aggressive until the End Phase • 1 Frightened Marker, value (0)

fields.name: Tenchi
fields.uniqueEffects:
During Deployment choose a Friendly model. This model's Bodyguard and Co-ordinated Attack traits refer to that model.
If this model would make a Fear Test against a model with Soulless, it automatically succeeds.

fields.name: Tenbatsu
fields.uniqueEffects: During the Starting Phase: • If this model does not use Oni Rage, it gains Fear (6), Terror, and Soulless. It must use only the Cursed Katana in Melee Exchanges. • If this model uses Oni Rage, it must use only the Infernal Katana during Melee Exchanges.

fields.name: The Grey Pilgrim
fields.uniqueEffects: A model Damaged by a Call Lightning or Raijin’s Rage Attack gains a Stunned Marker. This model cannot be Targeted by Call Lightning Ranged Attacks or by Attacks generated by the Raijin’s Rage Ki Feat.

fields.name: Toshiro
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model may use any non-Exceptional Special Attack or Defence at cost (1).
Each time a VP is scored, each non-Insignificant model gains 1 Ki Token. While this model is in play, other models with marked Wound boxes gain +1 Melee Strength and Aggressive.

fields.name: Yanjing
fields.uniqueEffects: When making a Ranged Attack, Friendly Princess models are never considered to be in BtB with the Target.

fields.name: Ancestor Spirit
fields.uniqueEffects:
When this model Channels Ki Tokens to Target Friendly model, the Target gains 1 of the following effects until the End Phase: • This model gains Resistance (1) • This model gains Bravery • This model gains Ranged Defence (1)
When a Friendly model within 6" is removed from play this model gains a number of Ki Tokens equal to the removed model's Ki Statistic.

fields.name: Baichi
fields.uniqueEffects: This model can only Heal Blood Brother models. This model can only be recruited into a Warband that contains all three Blood Brothers: Shenziqi, Ying-Jian, and Shuohuang.

fields.name: Bikou
fields.uniqueEffects:
If an Attack with this weapon is successful and the individual dice results of the Damage Roll are the same number this weapon gains Pierce (3) for that Damage Roll.
At the start of this model's activation, choose 1 of the following: • This model gains the following weapon profile until the end of the activation:   RWS: Special, Range: -/3/-, Traits: Lightweight, Specials: Sweep Attack (0)   This model may only make 1 Ranged Attack with the Kusari per activation. • This model gains Move Boost (2) until the end of the activation.

fields.name: Eldest Brother
fields.uniqueEffects:
When recruited into a Warband with Hiroto, this model gains Flank and always deploys in BtB with Hiroto when he deploys.
This model may be recruited into any Descension or Shiho Theme that does not specifically restrict it.

fields.name: Lua
fields.uniqueEffects:
When rolling for Damage with this Weapon if the individual dice values of the damage Roll are the same number, the Enemy model gains a Blind Marker.
This Equipment may be given to Crab models.
Before or after resolving any action, this model may make a Ranged Attack with its Pistol. This does not cause this model to lose an Activation Counter.

fields.name: Kami of Tempered Iron
fields.uniqueEffects:
When this model suffers Wounds in a Melee Exchange, the Attacker is pushed directly away from this model until it leaves this model's ZoC.
During the Starting Phase choose 1 of the following: • Remove this model from play and choose 1 model in BtB. That model's Melee Weapons gain Sharp (1), Pierce (1), and Brutal (+1) until the End Phase. • Choose 1 model in BtB. That model's Melee Weapons gain Sharp (1), and Pierce (1).

fields.name: Shosu
fields.uniqueEffects:
If this model would make a Fear Test against a model with Intangible or Soulless, it automatically succeeds. When this model uses a non- Ki Boost Ki Feat it gains a Control Marker after the current Activation is resolved.
If this model is Killed, instead put the model Elsewhere. In the Starting Phase, Deploy any Lone Swordsmen that are Elsewhere into play with no marked Wound boxes, in BtB with a Lone Swordsman model. If both Lone Swordsmen are Elsewhere at the same time, remove them from play.  These models must always declare the same action unless one of them performs a Charge, Stand Up or Wait actions.  When a Lone Swordsman model would generate Ki Tokens (or otherwise gain Ki Tokens) instead place those Ki Tokens on this card. Either Lone Swordsman model may spend Ki Tokens from this card to pay for Ki Feats, Boosts, or other effects.  This model cannot have Enhancement cards attached.

fields.name: Khendish
fields.uniqueEffects:
Enemy models may not use Melee Boosts while in a Melee Exchange with this model.
This model always has Cover. This model may use Fire Spin despite the Stupid trait.

fields.name: Batu
fields.uniqueEffects: In the End Phase, if this model is in contact with a neutral board edge, you may place this model Elsewhere. This model returns to play using the Flank rules. When Targeting a non-Soulless model, this model's Ranged Weapons gain Entangling.

fields.name: Tru'pah
fields.uniqueEffects:
In the Starting Phase, this model gains a Frightened Marker. This model treats all Enemy models as if they have Fear (5). While in a Melee Exchange with this model, Enemy models lose Rise and Last Stand.  This model may always recruit the Eagle Banner Enhancement - Equipment card.
This model may be recruited into Shiho Themes as if it were a Faction model. If recruited into a Shiho Theme, this model is considered a Shiho model and may have Shiho Faction Enhancements attached to it.

fields.name: Karu
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model may be included in The Imperial March theme; if it is this model begins the game with 2 Ki. Other than Fates Entwined, this model cannot gain Ki except during Ki Generation.
• Friendly models gain Co-ordinated Attack [Friendly]. • You may recruit models into theis Theme as if you had recruited a Hiroto model, even if you do not include Hiroto.  Permitted [ Hiroto]

fields.name: Kami of the Empty Mind
fields.uniqueEffects:
When this model suffers Wounds from a Melee attack, after the Melee Exchange is resolved the attacking model gains a Spirit Block Marker.
During the Starting Phase choose 1 of the following: • Remove this model from play. If you do remove all Ki Tokens from non-Soulless models within 2". • Remove 1 Ki Token from an Enemy model within 6" and place it on this model, any Ki Tokens in excess of this model's Ki Statistic may be given to 1 model in BtB.
When this model makes a successful Melee or Ranged attack, instead of rolling Damage remove a Ki Token from the model and place it on this model. This model cannot have more than 2 Ki Tokens, any Ki Tokens in excess of this model's Ki Statistic may be given to 1 model in Btb.  When this model is Killed, you may add 1 Counter to the Blessings of the Void Communal Card if you have recruited it into your Warband.
When a model moves into BtB with Attached model, if this model was not already in BtB with an Enemy model, place the model within 2" of its current location and not in the ZoC of an Enemy model, then discard this card.  Requirement [Brotherhood Theme]
Requirement [Brotherhood Theme] Exclusion [Monk]

fields.name: Ichiro
fields.uniqueEffects:
If this model begins its activation within 3" of a Monk, it loses Cowardly for the rest of the activation.
This card represents three different models, each with their own abilities. A Warband may not recruit multiples of the same Eagle.

fields.name: Dawn Eagle
fields.uniqueEffects: While within 1" of the model, Friendly models gain Aware. When in a Melee Exchange with a Tiny model, this model's Talons Melee Weapon gains Throw Attack (0).

fields.name: Fuwa Eagle
fields.uniqueEffects: When this model arives from Elsewhere, if it declares a Charge Action, it does not need LoS to its Target. The Charge Target is Surprised, regardless of the usual Surprised requirements.

fields.name: Hozumi Koga
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model cannot declare Melee or Charge actions against Hinadori.
If Hinadori is removed from play, this model loses all Ki Tokens and is also removed from play in the End Phase of the last turn.
If the Attached model is not already in BtB with an Enemy model, when an Enemy model moves into BtB with the Attached model as part of a Melee or Charge action, that Enemy model gains a Blind Marker.

fields.name: Kiyozumi Kicho
fields.uniqueEffects: While attempting to Target this model, Enemy models lose Sixth Sense.

fields.name: Hozumi Maha
fields.uniqueEffects:
If this model successfully attacks in a Melee Exchange while using this Weapon, the opposing model gains a Frightened Marker.
This model begins the game with 3 Ghost Tokens. When this model suffers Wounds, instead remove a Ghost Token for each Wound that would be suffered. When this model spends Ki Tokens, it may instead remove any number of Ghost Tokens and pay that many fewer Ki.

fields.name: Hozumi Daihanji
fields.uniqueEffects: This model may only use its Encourage ki feat on Peasant, Villager, and Hozumi models.

fields.name: Taiyo
fields.uniqueEffects: Enhancement - Equipment cards bought for Warbands that have recruited this model cost -1 Rice (to a minimum of 1).

fields.name: Ryokeen
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model cannot declare Melee or Charge actions against Hozumi Koga.
When recruited into The Hozumi Family Theme, this model gains Co-ordinated Attack [Hozumi].

fields.name: Kiyozumi Hinadori
fields.uniqueEffects:
This model cannot declare Melee or Charge actions against Koga.
If Koga is removed from play, this model gains Vengeance [Enemy] and is also removed from play in the End Phase of the last turn.

fields.name: Kiyozumi Haiboku
fields.uniqueEffects: This model must use its Bodyguard trait whenever it is able.

fields.name: Tadaoki
fields.uniqueEffects: If this model gains any Ki using its Leech trait then Enemy models cannot declare the use of Special Defences in Melee Exchanges with this model until the End Phase.

fields.name: Atsunobu
fields.uniqueEffects: If this model gains any Ki using its Leech trait then it gains Bravery until the End Phase.

fields.name: The Dark Pilgrim
fields.uniqueEffects:
This weapon's Rapid Fire Trait is variable. X is equal to the number of Stunned Markers on Enemy models within 6" of this model.
While this model is in play, a model Damaged by a Call Lightning or Raijin’s Rage Attack gains a Stunned Marker and a Fire (1) Marker. This model cannot be Targeted by Call Lightning Ranged Attacks or by Attacks generated by the Raijin’s Rage Ki Feat.
This model does not need LOS for its Bird Strike Ranged Attack and ignores Cover and Tiny modifiers but can never Surprise the Target. This model can make only one Bird Strike Ranged Attack per turn.

fields.name: Plainsmen Falconer B
fields.uniqueEffects:
In the Starting Phase, remove a Friendly Destructible Terrain item from the table.  Requirement [Brotherhood Theme]
No Event cards may be played until the End Phase.  Requirement [Brotherhood Theme]
Your opponent may choose to automatically win the Tactical Test this turn. If they do, you may add an Activation Counter to any Friendly model.
When a Friendly model fails a Fear Test, if it is within 3" of another Friendly model it gains Steadfast until the End Phase.  Requirement [Brotherhood Theme]
When an Opposing Player uses an Event card costing 3 or less Rice, you may immediately play this card to cancel that Event card. The Event card is discarfded just as if it had taken effect.  Requirement [Brotherhood Theme]
Choose a model to gain Bodyguard [Hiroto](3") until the end of the activation.  Requirement [Brotherhood Theme]
X Friendly models gain Flank. X cannot be greater than 3.  Requirement [Brotherhood Theme]
While within 3" of a Friendly Imperial model, this model gains Aware and its Melee Weapons gain Reach. This model cannot declare Melee or Charge Actions Targeting Imperial models.
This model begins the game with a Death Sentence Marker.
This model's base Melee Pool and Ki Statistics are variable. X is equal to the number of Blood Brothers recruited into the Warband that have not been Destroyed.
When refreshing Activation Counters in the Starting Phase, this model only gains 1 instead of 2.
This model may be recruited into any Warband that has recruited Hiroto.
